inline.description:
1. Navigate to Main Menu âžœ Send Email Invite and Create multiple email invitations to a team including some that you have email inbox access to
  2. Go to the email inbox of the first invite you sent and sign up
  3. Main Menu âžœ System Console âžœ Authentication âžœ Signup
  4. Click on "Invalidate pending email invites" button
  5. Go the the email inbox of the second invite you sent and try to sign up
inline.expectedResult:
After #2,
  • You should be able to sign up using the invite link in the email

After #5,
  • You shouldn't be able to sign up and should get an error "The signup link does not appear to be valid"

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Queued) Inconsistent behavior when invalidating email invitations â€” MM-24974
